body.name: Madison Park Boone Cozy Comforter Set, Faux Suede, Deluxe Hotel Styling All Season Down Alternative Bedding Matching Shams, Decorative Pillow, Queen (90 in x 90 in), Rustic Brown 7 Piece
features: For a warm, lodge look in your space, the Madison Park Boone Collection is perfect for you.
The unique fabric used in this set has a textured earthy print pieced with polyester microsuede at the bottom and buttons for a personal touch.
Three decorative pillows using piecing and embroidery of both top of bed fabrics completing this cohesive look.
Set includes: 1 Comforter: 90"W x 90"L, 2 Standard Shams: 20"W x 26"L, 1 Bed Skirt: 60"W x 80"L + 15"D, 3 Decorative Pillows: 18"W x 18"L/16"W x 16"L/12"W x 18"L
Care instructions: Machine washable, Spot clean pillows
body.description: For a warm, lodge look in your space, the Madison Park Boone Collection is perfect for you. The unique fabric used in this set has a textured earthy print pieced with polyester microsuede at the bottom and buttons for a personal touch. Three decorative pillows using piecing and embroidery of both top of bed fabrics completing this cohesive look. Machine washable for easy care, this comforter set brings a refresh update to your bedroom décor. Items in the set may come in a rolled or compressed packaging, which will need to be fluffed up or steam ironed before use to remove wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my college aged son. He prefers to sleep with just a sheet. He will now at least cover up the sheet when he wakes up and it’s soft. So, he will lay on top of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Set, Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I never much cared for the way my room looked before but for some reason I decided that it needed to look presentable after purchase of a new bedroom set. The new set was walnut so I wanted something in that color range. Being new to decorating my room, it took some time to make a decision on a comforter set. Again, not knowing much about home decorating really(brands,sizes,etc.), I decided on this Madison Park. In fact I had 3 others from the same brand in my wish list for comparison. This fit the bill perfectly. First of all, it came packaged well with a nice thick heavy plastic bag that can be used for later storage. Second, was the comforter itself. It's thick and plush without being too bulky. All seams are nicely sewn along with the buttons on this particular model. They are very secure. With a light blanket it's the perfect weight for my cold natured self. The shams and pillows are well made and very good looking to boot. The whole color scheme is well represented in the photos. The comforter washes well, but being large, it sometimes reverts into ball form in my HE dryer, so it does sometimes require spot ironing for a completely smooth look. All in all, this was a home run of a purchase. Well made, nice color, perfect fit, and great price. I couldn't ask for more for being a first time buyer. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit overpriced for the quality
reviews.reviewText: This bedding set is really beautiful and makes a plain bed instantly shift into "dressed up" status. The quality of the materials is ok - not stellar, but nothing to complain about - and the workmanship on the stitching is reasonable - no obvious errors (loose/missing stitches, signs of being "irregular," etc.) or skill issues to note. The set comes with several throw pillows as well as a bed skirt, all of which ended up packaged and stored because I'm just not that interested in the extras. In all, a lovely set which does a nice job of dressing up the bedroom.Now the negatives - well, only one, honestly. It's the horizontal pleating at the "ankle level" when the bed is made. Unfortunately, after tossing the comforter into the dryer (to fluff it up and help reduce some of the dog hair my pup left behind), a section of the pleated portion "reversed" itself somehow and will not (absolutely NOT!) lie flat anymore. A friend suggested taking an iron to it, but meh, I'm pretty sure that's just how I end up with scorch marks on my blanket! Hoping a spritz and a re-fluff in the dryer will remedy the issue. Still, it's a pretty set and had I not messed it up in the dryer I wouldn't have anything negative to say about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great set from this company.
reviews.reviewText: Again, very nice comforter set for the money. Great combination of color usage, the pillows are a great add in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Well at first it seemed nice absolutely beautiful, I washed it twice and then on the third wash it melted. I made sure to wash cold and dry tumble light heat. I pulled it out to flip it because it was still damp and it was melted. So not worth the money, it’s shrank so fits a queen more than a king, it’s very light and the stitching is starting to come undone.
Great product. The colors are a match to picture. I ordered the cal. king and it fits perfect. Wonderful.
Excelentes materiales, elegante, buen diseño y muy confortable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Completo, solo OJO, no incluye sabanas.
reviews.reviewText: El articulo menciona que es el set completo, pero no incluye sabanas, no es un problema mayor a comprarlas aparte, pero es una gran adicion a mis Sets de cama.

I loved the product but unfortunately due to the rapid declining poor customer service i have decided to cancel my account I habe slways felt that the best customer service I habe ever had was with Amazon but recent transaction has left a horrible scar and I hope nobody else endures this but if you shop here like I did you will soon find out that this once small company that I bive built their trillion dollar company from what I considered the best customer serviced I have ever had now do not need to meet those expectations. Way to go Amazon. Likely this will not get posted because Amazon will want to let people find out the hard way so if not I will find another way to voice my opinion and if it does get posted it just a warning for anyone who has been long time customer

I bought a queen for my double/full and fits perfect. Love the look and buttons are cute. Very soft to the touch. Washed nicely but I did hang outside to dry. I don’t sleep with it but I’m sure it would fair well either way. It’s better quality than the one I bought for $400 at Bed Bath and Beyond years ago.
